title: Chinese Tech Stocks Lead Market Rebound
sub_head: More supportive stance from China’s leadership helps stocks reverse some of their recent losses
body:
HONG KONG— Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. and other Chinese technology stocks jumped by double-digit percentages, leading a broader market rally, on investor hopes that the government would do more to support the sector and the broader economy.
The surge on Friday helped Chinese shares recoup some of their recent losses, while the yuan also clawed back some ground against the dollar after sharply selling off in recent sessions.
